name: pavo-tower-defense
description: Tower Defense game, for senior capstone at Oregon State University

scripts.start_dev: forever start -c "npm run build_watch" ./ && forever start -c "npm run start" ./
scripts.stop: npm run stop_forever_server && npm run stop_build_watch && npm run stop_node
scripts.stop_forever_server: for i in $(forever list | grep "npm run start" | cut -c24-27); do forever stop $i; done;
scripts.stop_build_watch: for i in $(forever list | grep "npm run build_watch" | cut -c24-27); do forever stop $i; done
